My name is Yuchen Xu. I am a Postdoctoral scholar at the Department of Statistics and Data Science, University of California, Los Angeles. Here I work with Professor [George Michailidis](https://georgemichailidis.github.io/) on topics about panel time series analysis. Prior to that I got my Ph.D from the Department of Statistics & Data Science at Cornell University, advised by Professor [David S. Matteson](https://davidsmatteson.com/). I am actively engaged in a number of funded grant projects.

My current research interests are high-dimensional time series analysis, image analysis, and panel data analysis, covering topics such as regression, dimension reduction, tensor decomposition, etc. I am also interested in science-integrated applications with topics including material science, finance, medical data analysis, signal processing, and behavior science.

___I am currently actively seeking tenure track opportunities in statistics and data science.___

Please find my CV [here](https://github.com/XycYuchenXu/YuchenXu/raw/main/assets/cv_yuchen.pdf).
